item.title: ‘Cringe-inducing football pun goes here’
item.author: Simon Carnochan,
item.description: Football Manager, undeniably the best football management game on Earth, is back again. My addictive relationship with the game began at the tender age of seven and I’ve been hooked ever since, even turning up fifteen minutes late to my GCSE Religious Studies exam due to an FA Cup semi-final with …
